other_tests.findings: New left-sided PICC line with the tip of the line projecting over the cavoatrial junction; no evidence of complications, notably no pneumothorax. Constant small parenchymal opacity at the right lung base; no other parenchymal changes.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The small parenchymal opacity at the right lung base is constant and unchanged.

other_tests.procedure_name: CT-guided drainage of abdominal fluid collections
